summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to capital facilities; authorizing and providing for the issuance and sale of limited tax general obligation bonds, in one or more series, if renewal of a Seattle Center and Community Center levy lid lift is approved by the qualified voters of the City at an election therein on November 2, 1999, for the purposes of paying part of the costs of redeveloping the Seattle Center Opera House into a Performance Hall, the costs of issuance and sale of the bonds, and for other City purposes approved by ordinance; providing for terms, covenants and manner of sale of the bonds; and providing for agreements and activities in connection with the bonds.
